manifest.title: oPodSync
manifest.author: oPodSync developers
manifest.description:
### About

oPodSync is a minimalist podcast synchronization server, for self-hosting your podcast listening / download history.
This allows you to keep track of which episodes have been listened to.

### Features

* Compatible with GPodder and NextCloud gPodder Sync APIs
* Stores history of subscriptions and episodes (plays, downloads, etc.)
* Sync between devices
* Compatible with gPodder desktop client
* Self-registration
* See subscriptions and history on web interface
* Fetch feeds and episodes metadata and store them locally (optional)

create-inital-admin.message: Visit the app to create the initial admin account. Registration is disabled afterwards.
